website_summaries.verdict: If you want organic tea in a variety of blends with bold flavors that will leave you wanting more, this is the one to get.
pros: A fantastic assortment of unique organic blends – Mountain Oolong, Darjeeling Quince, Orange Jasmine, Lemon Lavender, and Vanilla Pear
Includes 15 single serve loose leaf teas that smell and taste great
cons: You may have to tweak the steeping process to match your taste preferences so the flavor doesn't turn out too weak or too strong

customer_reviews.title: The snail was not listed in the ingredients. Ick.
customer_reviews.text: The lemon lavender tea had a SNAIL in the pouch. Yuck.
customer_reviews.author: sus

customer_reviews.title: Fake flavoring
customer_reviews.text: Some of the flavors are okay. The kiwi one is the worst tea I've ever tried. Packaging is beautiful. Wish tea forte would stop with the fake flavoring. though. It's overpowering the tea itself. Picture adding drink mix in with your tea. Won't buy again. It's a shame because the tea itself looks gorgeous... They missed the mark with the additive.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Lady

customer_reviews.title: These don't taste very fresh
customer_reviews.text: These don't taste very fresh. The lable seems to cover the expiration date, but when removed it does say 2020. So they aren't expired. I have had Teaforte, though not in a few years. They had taste. These don't. Maybe teaforte has gone downhill. T. But the good news is I did not get a full box but samplers.
customer_reviews.author: HL

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly strong tea.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those teas that, if you don't like it too strong, you must adhere to the instructions on the package. I let the Vanilla one steep for about five minutes, and it was undrinkable. It felt like I was literally drinking potpourri. If you don't like your tea strong, I'd recommend a maximum steep time of about two minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Casey May

customer_reviews.title: Well....this is just nasty. Unless you enjoy chemicals. This is food?
customer_reviews.text: Chemicals. Thats Exactly what this tastes like. After trying the cherry, and almond.... nasty. So, I opened up the other flavors & they all smelled just like they tasted, like a cleaning product. Couldn't even get past a sip. What a waste of money. This is quite possibly the worst tea I've ever purchased. Ever. Not only that.... but these obviousally must be contaminated... so this, in my opnion, would make you sick, if you could actually get it down your throat.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Riedstra

customer_reviews.title: Nice presentation; really nasty flavors
customer_reviews.text: This was the most disappointing tea purchase I have ever made. The only palatable flavor was the blueberry. The cherry tasted like medicine, the apricot tasted like straw, the kiwi lime was flavorless, and the orange, which is usually my favorite tea flavor, was just nasty. The packaging was nice and I really like the concept of single serving envelopes for loose tea. But I ended up throwing it all out.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Great for all kinds of tea lovers!
customer_reviews.text: Got this set for my boyfriend who recently got into drinking tea and he absolutely loved it! Though he normally doesn't like green tea he loves this set and drinks at least one cup from it every day. I have both purchased and been given multiple products from Tea Forte and for the price, the quality of the products and presentation of the packaging is always on point! Not only do these sets make great gifts on their own but they're also a great way to sample different kinds of teas without getting a box of 20+ teabags. Overall great quality, great packaging, great products. <3
customer_reviews.author: ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

customer_reviews.title: I havent had the tea yet but I like that it comes in individually packed oz for each ...
customer_reviews.text: Received my package today. I got the lotus tea selection. Cute design and packaging. I havent had the tea yet but I like that it comes in individually packed oz for each teapot or cup. Cant wait to try. Looks exactly like picture and supply here.
customer_reviews.author: BuyerYaB

customer_reviews.title: Nice packaging, not so nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Packaging is nice, individual package for one serving is nice too. However, there are too much of chopped tea leaf, making it difficult to drink the tea without getting small pieces of tea leaf in my mouth. There are even more smaller pieces of some kind of flower pedals or something in there as well. The Lemon Lavender does not suite for my taste bud (my son's comment was "weird smell"), the mountain Oolong tasted too old from my other Oolong tea brands. do not know what surprise it will bring me for the rest of flavors in this box, kind of disappointed already.
customer_reviews.author: a user

customer_reviews.title: Quality tea
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love our tea and haven’t been able to find tasty loose leaf organic teas much anywhere so I went out on a whim and ordered this sampler and was so impressed I found Tea Fortes website and signed up for emails. Some of their teas are expensive but some I can buy in a tin pretty reasonably. Besides Charleston Tea Plantation’s tea this is my new go to. Delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Julie K

customer_reviews.title: The presentations Is Truly Lovely But
customer_reviews.text: that is all that is lovely about these teas. I've tried each flavor now and though they are fresh and steep just fine, the flavor is absolutely off somehow. Maybe it's the brand, as I usually prefer these flavors, but these were much too bitter for my taste buds. I usually use 1 tbsp. honey in 8oz of tea. All of these were so bitter and harsh not even refined sugar softened up that underlying tang that made me produce bile instantly. Sadly, not for me. Not this brand with these flavors combined.
customer_reviews.author: VictoriaSelene Skye~Deme

customer_reviews.title: LOADED with caffeine! Not "relaxing" as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: HOW DO THEY CALL THIS RELAXING? I was looking at other "relaxing herbal teas" that were all caffeine-free, so I thought "LOTUS: A collection of relaxing teas for mind, body and spirit" (quote from the box) wouldn't have them LOADED with caffeine. Yes, I suppose I should have looked up each individual tea (Tea Forte's beautifully designed website doesn't make it that easy), but this is extremely frustrating. I just bought a set of tea I can't drink because of poor advertising! Here are the caffeine amounts: Mountain Oolong: 31-40 MG Orange Jasmine: 21-30 MG Vanilla Pear: 11-20 MG Darjeeling Quince: 11-20 MG Lemon Lavender: Non-Caffeinated; the only "herbal tea." The only one? In a "relaxation" set? Seriously?
customer_reviews.author: BT

customer_reviews.title: Love this tea!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this so I could offer my clients fresh tea when they come into my office. I've been trying out the flavors first and I have to say, I love every single flavor. I've been so happy with these that I ordered another box and plan to keep it in stock all the time. I've ordered some of the other blends because I really like the convenience of the single serving size for my office but I haven't tried them yet. I can say for sure though that the Lotus sampler box rocks!
customer_reviews.author: Rissy

customer_reviews.title: Loose tea
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for myself. It seemed a bit pricey, but loose tea is hard to find especially under current shopping conditions (Covid 19) so I decided to give it a try. What I have tried is good. Very flavorful. I don't like my tea real strong so I will make more than one cup out of the individual packets.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Neubert

customer_reviews.title: It has my recommendation - quality product
customer_reviews.text: They come in loose leaf single steep packets (not tea bags - so it will require an infuser). There are 15 of them in 5 different flavors with caffeine and without. They are USDA Organic. My review: The box is very presentable and the flavors are great. My favorite was the Vanilla Pear (white tea) and Orange Jasmine (green tea). I actually used this in a larger infuser for two cups and a single packet was enough. The quality of the product gave it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Taste like cough medicine
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Herbal Retreat sampler. It was absolutely disgusting. Had friends over for tea and was so embarrassed, everyone hated them, had to break out the tea bags. I tried every flavor, they all tasted the same - like artificial flavoring with a cough medicine chaser. If you love the flavor of Robitussin you will like these. Bad, so very bad. I threw them all in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: M. Henry

customer_reviews.title: A delightful sipping experiance!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased to receive my tea sampler, It's packaging was a fine way to display the selection. My first cup was the Green Mango Peach, oh what a Treat! Full of flavor, the tea really shown through. I could taste each individual ingredient of the mix, without one overpowering the other. It wasn't flavoring heavy. Each choice comes with three foil packs of delicious tea. perfectly portioned, and ready to prepare. I am greatly looking forward to my next flavorful adventure, Oh which one will I choose?!? Maybe the Earl Grey.
customer_reviews.author: Beastie420

customer_reviews.title: Great teas. I bought them for myself and liked them so much I purchased 4 more for gifts.
customer_reviews.text: These Teas are GREAT! I will buy these again. recommend buying a fine mesh tea infuser as some tea slips through the regular ones. I bought these to give with the tea boxes that were Christmas gifts:  If the link doesn't work, look up: E-Online 4-Pack Fine Mesh Silicone Tea Infuser - Stainless Steel Fine Mesh Tea Filter with BPA-Free Silicone Leaf Handle and Drip Tray - Perfect Tea Strainers for All Types of Loose Leaf Tea
customer_reviews.author: GoatGirl

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: The tea was good but a couple of the teas tasted aweful. I think the ginger one both smelled bad and tasted bad. I will never get that one again. But all in all, it was interesting to try different teas that i had never had before. Fun to taste them without having to commit to 1 flavor so i gave it 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: mattymom

customer_reviews.title: Too much residue fallout
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to receive this today and made myself a hot tea immediately. I used a stainless stell tea ball to my shock, teaspoon full of tiny deied tea leaves fell out creating a dirty mess!!!!! I had to pour it out w a sifter to filter put the residue and i am not very happy about this.
customer_reviews.author: MissTexas

customer_reviews.title: Delicious tea
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try some variety but nothing too different. This sampler did not disappoint—fragrant and tasteful teas. If you are not sure, I say give it a try. Some tastes are not for everyone, but you might just find your next favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality, aromatic and delicious
customer_reviews.text: Every Tea Forte flavor I’ve tried has been exceptional. Even the flavors that I normally wouldn’t select have been fantastic. I’m extremely happy with this company’s quality. I’ve tried every flavor I can find and look forward to new ones in the future. You can smell the high quality blend of ingredients as soon as you open the package. I’ve not been disappointed at all. Keep up the good work.
customer_reviews.author: GSDCJST

customer_reviews.title: A nice gift
customer_reviews.text: I received these as a gift from my husband. The teas are nice. I didn't love all the flavors and but they are fresh and the packaging is nice. The box set was pretty. I was a bit surprised when I saw how much he paid for them as they seem very expensive for the amount of tea you get. I would have to say you are paying for the packaging and the fact that they are Tea Forte. Nice for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Birdie

customer_reviews.title: I dislike ginger intensely
customer_reviews.text: Bit of a mistake for me. I dislike ginger intensely, so planned on tossing out the ginger kiwi. However, the Cherry Cosmo is bitter/sour. I didn't care for that. The Blueberry Merlot was, for me, also awful because of the ginger that is in that savory mix. The Apricot Amaretto was just 'ok'. The Mojito Marmalade.. I think it was a waste of money. I am glad that there are some folks out there who love it,though!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: They're all delicious.
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I don't think I could give this enough stars. I loved every single flavor in this packet. If I had to complain about anything, it's that there aren't more packets!! I am definitely buying the larger tins of this stuff, and asking as gifts. Without a doubt my favorite tea that I've had so far. My only other experiences have been with Bigelow, Celestial Seasonings, and Lipton mixes. I couldn't even pick a favorite out of this set, they are all that good. I have been water fasting, and this is my treat each evening. A nice hot cup of tea. What a pleasure :)
customer_reviews.author: Lea S

customer_reviews.title: LOW Quality tea
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the sampler because I've been looking at Tea Forte's website and I wanted to try their tea before ordering in bulk. I'm glad I did and I will not be ordering anything from Tea Forte. It's "organic" but it's loaded with "natural" flavor so the tea isn't getting it's flavor naturally from the leaves or botanicals, most of the flavor is coming from the additives. The "natural" flavor makes the tea look like it has dye in it. It actually stained my mug. It tastes unnatural and lacks complexity. I might as well have bought some cheap generic tea bags.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Wolf

customer_reviews.title: The other varieties are better
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the other varieties of the single steeps, by unfortunately this one fell flat. The flavors all have a chemical-like flavor and are all either too bitter or stale. The flavors sound enticing, but they really don’t taste like tea at all.
customer_reviews.author: Irina

customer_reviews.title: Sip and Relax tea
customer_reviews.text: Tea Forte has ruined me for "cheap" teas. This tea is well worth the price. While it is labeled 'single steep,' I do brew two cups from one packet. The second is, of course, not quite as strong as the first, but still enjoyable. I use this with the same brand tea cup with strainer and lid found on this site and it works very well. I am truly enjoying this as an end-of-the-day de-stresser.
customer_reviews.author: Just me

customer_reviews.title: not a huge variety as a matter of fact
customer_reviews.text: Overall I wasn't super impressed or satisifed.. The Chai and Black Tea was fine... African Solstice smelled and tasted like cough medicine! Sencha did not taste authentic I thought you couldn't go wrong with green tea but.. and the mint was fine.. I didn't feel like it had a whole variety to it, even tho it's an "around the world tea", they were all very similar and strong in taste
customer_reviews.author: Sofia

customer_reviews.title: It has an added sweetener...not good.
customer_reviews.text: It has added sweetener. Doesn't taste natural. I did not like it! I gave them away. The taste is not good. It has a pretty packaging & smells good but the sweetener ruins it. Will not recommend or purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: TeddyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good Tea but didn't receive all I was supposed to.
customer_reviews.text: So far the 2 teas I tried are great, however I just realized I am missing 4 of the tea samples that were supposed to be in the box. Not sure of this is a common problem with this company but based on the quality of tea I would like to order more from them in the future. If I am going to keep not receiving all that I am supposed to though I am not sure about it.
customer_reviews.author: Tallguy

customer_reviews.title: Worth the splurge!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a friend but ended up finding her something else so I kept it for myself. I'm so glad I did! This tea is really wonderful. I'm typically a black tea drinker but Tea Forte's herbals are so delicious, I find myself opting for them more often than my usual English breakfast tea. Of course, this tea is much more expensive than my usual but it's worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: Smells & Looks great, all Terrible flavors.
customer_reviews.text: I love that this tea smells so great out of the bag and the quality dried ingredients; however, the taste and flavors of each one are terrible according to my tastebuds. I’m not getting a good impression of these 5 flavors. Sadly, I won’t be buying these 5 flavors again after trying them for the first time.
customer_reviews.author: One Life

customer_reviews.title: For gifts, they are very nice
customer_reviews.text: I really loved all of these, but the mint was my favorite. The packets are perfectly proportioned. I have no problem with the tea or the presentation. I bought this and a couple of the tea forte infuser mugs for Christmas presents. I personally tried one of each of the tea flavors and they are very good. For gifts, they are very nice but I don't think I will buy them for myself for regular consumption because they are a bit too pricey.
customer_reviews.author: J Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Nasty
customer_reviews.text: I got Assorted - Tea Tasting, it's horrible. i tried only mango peach, nasty chemical taste. now i understand why it's non-refundable. what a waist of money
customer_reviews.author: &amp;#34;unknown&amp;#34;

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful tea experience
customer_reviews.text: These are rare and delightful teas, beautifully packaged. I drink a lot of tea, various brands, and these are truly unique. I love opening the little packets and seeing the minimally processed ingredients--all kinds of little fruity bits and other biota. For a thorough brew, I recommend boiling 10 or 12 ounces of water in a little saucepan, dump in the tea, cover, and let it seep. Then strain into your cup and savor: pleasing to the eye, nose, and palate.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Tenery

customer_reviews.title: Continued quality and freshness
customer_reviews.text: These are the only teas I drink. They are the freshest. THey offer a great selection. I have tried a variety of their different teas and found them all lovely. I received my first "taste" of this tea when one of my students from Korea gifted me a box. I order them every since.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Decker

customer_reviews.title: Not my cup of tea
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and the infuser mug as a birthday gift to myself and was very disappointed. Does not taste fresh. Seems old bland and even bitter after trying each flavor!! Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: BlackSwanMysticsFB

customer_reviews.title: Delicious, too much packaging
customer_reviews.text: First of all this tea is REALLY good. I’ve enjoyed every cup and went through my box faster than any other because it was so tasty. I should have looked closer at the description. I wanted loose leaf tea to avoid as much packaging as packed tea bags. From the pictures I thought it was packaged by flavor, not the serving like this set. Kinda of defeating what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Lacie

customer_reviews.title: it us a mixture of leaves and the fine leaves you get in a tea bag
customer_reviews.text: I haven't drank all the selections yet, but the African one and the Moroccan mint are very tasty. Esp the African tea, you really get a complex, almost fruity taste. The only reason I have for stars is that I thought these would be all tea leaves, it us a mixture of leaves and the fine leaves you get in a tea bag, almost a tea dust. Not sure how else to explain. This is still a very good buy, the teas are flavorful and taste very good.
customer_reviews.author: J Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Chemical Cocktails!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set and the Winter Collection. Based on the rave reviews on Amazon I had great expectations. What a major let down! I found the cherry and blueberry mix so nasty tasting I threw out the rest of the bags. The other 3 flavor are slightly better, but nothing that would entice me to ever buy tea forte again. The strongly flavored teas taste and smell similar to Koolaid. That's a lot of money down the drain! The attractive packaging and catchy names don't make up for over-flavored tea!
customer_reviews.author: Californiagirl

customer_reviews.title: These are not your English grandmothers teas!
customer_reviews.text: These teas have made me fall in love with tea drinking. I got them as a gift and have since bought more. I keep them at the office, in my purse, at home, etc. Most of them are good alone. Sometimes I add honey and for the darker varieties, the occasional hint of milk or cream. Lots of exotic flavors and some that are rather dessert like in nature.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie J Stone

customer_reviews.title: Mouthwatering
customer_reviews.text: Bought with the mug which made the most amazing teachers gift. Looking forward to buying my own due to the EXCELLENT review from my sons teacher. The aroma from her tea was mouthwatering. She described them as a gourmet tea in her own home that was prepared to perfection. The box was basically gift wrapped and available for presentation immediately. The calming & spa like packaging really emphasized the products all around flavors. Beautifully executed.
customer_reviews.author: Bruellets

customer_reviews.title: Product of Germany Packed in China....hmmmm
customer_reviews.text: Package says “Made of rare ingredients from small lot USDA CERTIFIED FARMS. Then it says product of Germany. Then it says “Packed in CHINA”. Can’t make this stuff up. Good packaging and presentation and decent taste though.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Woolman

customer_reviews.title: Just not good
customer_reviews.text: The flavors, Kiwi Ginger, Blueberry Merlot. Actually tasted bitter like wines. It was nasty. Disappointed in the product that had good reviews. Will not buy from company again.
customer_reviews.author: SlimCognito

customer_reviews.title: Fresh Good tasting single cup of tea
customer_reviews.text: Have really enjoyed the variety of teas provided and love the convience of brewing just 1 cup. Tastes like the "cuppa" I got when living in England. Teas are fresh in sealed single serving pouch. Top is hard to tear off as I have arthritus in my wrists, but I keep a pair of school sissors at my beverage cart just for that. Also use my Kerig coffee maker to dispense the hot water, which it does just as the tea directions recommend. Just Love it!
customer_reviews.author: L. McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: BEST TEA EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!!! I a must throughly enjoying ALL these beautiful fruity floral teas! I absolutely love them all; what a DELIGHT!!! I'm drinking the Cherry Merlot right now, and this time I added just a tsp of raw honey vs my usual two TBsp! The bagged tea I'm used to needed so much sweetness added, and these teas make me want to transport to Japan under a cherry tree. Sounds silly, but these teas are relaxing and comforting honestly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loose leaf tea is the way to go!
customer_reviews.text: I just loved everything about loose leaf tea. Freshness was astonishingly good. Packaging was stellar on preserving the freshness, flavor, and texture. The ease of just opening a steep packet of loose leaf tea was wonderful and smooth. You just tear and pour the tea into the infuser. It is as simple as that. Boil water either over the stove or in an electric tea kettle and pour in your tea pot. Put the filled infuser in and wait for a little bit or put infuser in the ceramic cup with lid and in minutes you have wonderful calming experience because of the aroma and taste of tea . It was heavenly. Calmed my nerves perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Guild

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The teas are great and taste good. They are packaged very nicely and I received them in good condition. Slightly smaller than I imagined but everything is as advertised. Not sure if the price is any better than if you went to Burlington Coat Factory (or somewhere like that) to purchase a similar tea set. You can probably find it in stores for a similar price. Good product though.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Best tea and tea variety out there!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a VERY picky tea drinker and she said these are some of the best she has ever had. Will become a regular in our cupboards. Just make sure you follow proper tea protocol. Not all tea is created equal and steeping time varies by tea. White tea steeps the least amount of time out of all of them otherwise it becomes very bitter. (Just a heads up for those wanting to try loose tea and unsure about steeping times)
customer_reviews.author: samantha wade

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try a new way of drinking Tea, so I ordered 3 different brands of Loose Tea Sampler Packs... Tea Forte was the 1st to arrive (Fastest Service, Says a lot about the company during this pandemic 👍🏽), and lets just say!! I still haven't received my tea from one company and the other was overall "Lackluster"!! Tea Forte was Flavorful, and the serving size is really good. This is definitely my 1st choice moving forward.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea for someone that likes tea.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these numerous times and the recipient absolutely loves them. They are easy to carry with you as they are in their own individual wrapping that doesn't easily break open by accident. Keeps the tea fresh. Great gift item for someone that is just starting to enjoy tea. None of the flavors are duds. Have bought several different variety boxes.
customer_reviews.author: geekygourmet

customer_reviews.title: I didnt like it but....
customer_reviews.text: To be honest I hated the flavor, its not tea but fruity water. That being said, the packets were awesome, shipping quick, everything was so pretty and it didnt taste horrid, but I am a hard core fruity black tea drinker. If you like fruit blends youll love it. And Customer Service was insanely good. Ive never seen nice and friendlier Customer Service people ever!
customer_reviews.author: Moria Grey

customer_reviews.title: Several unique teas that are fun to try
customer_reviews.text: Several unique teas that are fun to try. Bought this as a stocking stuffer and both me and my wife love it. Very long shelf life. Each sachet is a little large for a single cup so use twice or make two at a time. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew C. Hiday

customer_reviews.title: Delicious loose leaf teas for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tea as a deal on Amazon. The flavors are amazing! Our favorite was the chamomile, and citrus mint! Full of flavor and you get four packs per flavor, which comes out to about 3 cups of tea per batch. Try it, you won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Smiles and Cries

customer_reviews.title: Easy and quick for on the go
customer_reviews.text: Cute packaging and perfect for when you’re on the go or want to drink it when you get to the office I like my tea a little more flavor so I brewed less water so I could taste the flavor more. I liked it but for the price, I think it could have been better. Makes a great gift though!
customer_reviews.author: Leo Cho

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift!
customer_reviews.text: As an avid tea drinker I must say that I enjoy having all these yummy flavors at my fingertips and ready to go. I have several tea infusers and each one, although different from one another all work equally well. I would have to say that the Ginger tea would be my favorite and the pear is very interesting.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Great sampler if you’ve never tried these flavors
customer_reviews.text: I liked the Earl Gray, breakfast blend & mango green tea the best. I especially enjoyed the Earl Gray with a little almond milk & sugar. The flavor didn’t seem anymore potent than tea in a teabag but I enjoyed the strong fragrance first thing in the morning. I probably won’t buy this again because I would only want the 3 flavors I mentioned earlier.
customer_reviews.author: E. Loar

customer_reviews.title: Great tea. I've tried just three flavors and already ...
customer_reviews.text: Great tea. I've tried just three flavors and already turned around and bought 2 oz of each of those. I love that these are organic and the single steep pouch helps me get the right amount for each up. It does say single steep for 12 oz cup, but I have cheated and made a second smaller cup (8 oz) by reusing the leaves and it was just as good.
customer_reviews.author: Schroed

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for yourself or others
customer_reviews.text: I drink these teas daily at work and love having a few different options. I've cut down on caffeine lately but still like the ritual of getting a cup of coffee so these teas work perfectly. No caffeine and fantastic flavors. It's a great way to figure out what flavors you like, then you can buy a larger portion of the same flavor. This is what I've been using it for as I never really knew what flavors of tea I like. These samplers are a fantastic go-to item, especially as a gift!
customer_reviews.author: SS-Beantown

customer_reviews.title: Best Tea, I mean The Best Tea so far I have ever tasted!
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure I have any dislikes other than maybe more teas in a package. All the teas that I have tried have a fresh deep, flavor, with a smooth finish that pleases the palate. One of my favorite things only because I am a visual person, is the leaf on a stem look, (no strings attached), at the top of the tea bag...I also appreciate the Website that displays a colorful look of all the teas, and a description of what you are drinking. What can I say I am sold on this tea forever more! Last work great customer service...In appreciation Christine
customer_reviews.author: Christine M. Dura

customer_reviews.title: I did not like all of the teas in this collection but I ...
customer_reviews.text: Tea Forte is one of the highest quality loose teas on the market. I did not like all of the teas in this collection but I LOVE LOVE the fact that they have these sampler packs! I have found some of the best tasting teas that I might not have ever tried getting these samplers. And, I have to admit that I am one of those people that prefer loose tea to bagged tea so that I can customize the strength of the tea and the size of the pot/cup I am making.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Addict

customer_reviews.title: Good tea
customer_reviews.text: This was my first loose leaf tea purchase because I wanted to try it out. All of the flavors have been tried and they were all very good. I think my favorite was the Lemon Lavender, it had the right amount of citrus. There is a good chance I would buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: QualiTEA Time
customer_reviews.text: This tea sampler was perfect for trying out a new tea brand. We have loved every flavor. The Strawberry Apple is one my tween daughter's favorites!! Having tea together is a way for us to connect and trying a new tea brand has truly been a highlight during this unprecedented time. We are excited to try more flavors crafted by Tea Forte.
customer_reviews.author: Gaytra A.

customer_reviews.title: Score!!
customer_reviews.text: I purposely bought the sample pack so I could find out which one I really liked. Love the apricot amaretto. I ordered a canister of this because it was so good. The other flavors were good, but I would not order a canister of any of them.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Good tea, need to change the next one manually
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my mom. She is enjoying the tea, but you will get the same tea each time unless you go to the subscription page and change it. You do get a notification before the tea is shipped, so you will have time to change it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Very tasty, but super-small leaves
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy a special steeper for these. The leaves got through my regular one. The flavor is great. I give it only 4 stars because the size of the leaves and nothing in the description saying how small they are.
customer_reviews.author: Susanls67

customer_reviews.title: My mom loves these teas!
customer_reviews.text: I buy my mom a couple of different Tea Forte sets a year for various holidays. Whether the set is loose leaf or sachets, my mom loves the flavors and aromas of the teas. She is always so excited when she get a new set and will call in to report when she tries a new flavor. She loves these teas and they make her happy. That makes me happy.
customer_reviews.author: Commander HandCannon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing products, fresh quality
customer_reviews.text: I received the loose-leaf variety set on time, although the outer packaging was a bit crushed (I'm assuming this was done by Amazon package handlers). The teas were not affected. The taste of each tea was strong, yet amazing. One packet is enough to make a full 34 oz. French Press of flavourful tea. I will be repurchasing more of these to gift to others. I recommend buying- if not for yourself, for another tea lover.
customer_reviews.author: Asia

customer_reviews.title: They Were Okay
customer_reviews.text: Nothing special here. It was a Christmas gift. Packaging made it a bit more expensive than it should have been. The recipient, who loves to experiment with teas, said the teas were "okay" but nothing special.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Howard Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely just a small sampler, don't expect to be able to have more than one cup of each flavor. On the other hand, it's very pretty and priced well so it makes a great gift for the loose leaf tea lover in your life.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh Blandin

customer_reviews.title: These are the best teas in the world
customer_reviews.text: These are the best teas in the world. The black peach, Morrocan Mint, African, and most others are fabulous and worth every penny. Use a Zarafina Infuser machine or tea maker or you will not get correct infusion time and temperature needed to ensure the antioxidants are preserved and the tea is not bitter or spoiled by the boiling water. Zarafina is out of business but there are tea machines that are worth the time and money to brew a perfect cup every time. Keep it in the refrigerator as each pouch makes three cups so you do not waste it. Use raw honey to sweeten it and stevia if you prefer not to use sugar or honey.
customer_reviews.author: johnny

customer_reviews.title: Great assortment
customer_reviews.text: Love this assortment. I am a new tea drinker so its fun to try the different flavors. I love the fact that it’s individual packets of loose tea to brew. Get this assortment....you won’t be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: grammiegogo

customer_reviews.title: Great sampler
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect sampler if you want to try out some loose leaf tea. I haven't tried them all yet, but the ones I have I really enjoy. I have been adding a little honey for just a touch of sweetness and I think it makes the tea superb.
customer_reviews.author: BB1313

customer_reviews.title: Smells good and cute packaging.
customer_reviews.text: Great gift idea for the tea lovers in your life! Great gift to yourself too if you are the tea lover in your life. Gave as a gift with another sample pack and tea diffuser and got no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Jeni

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous aroma and flavor
customer_reviews.text: I combine 2 different flavors to get a wonderfully spicy, floral, tasty cup of tea. I don't even need sugar or milk or any of the additives most people put into their teas to either cut or add to the flavor. I will be ordering this again, only wish I could get a larger box with this selection of chi teas.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia H.

customer_reviews.title: I loved all flavors of the Herbal Retreat set
customer_reviews.text: I loved all flavors of the Herbal Retreat set, except for Kiwi Lime Ginger. Those are 3 of my favorite flavors, but they were too strong all together. All 4 of the others are delicious. It's so nice to have these sampler sets so that I can decide which larger tins to purchase. My favorite is the Mojito Marmalade. Yum!!
customer_reviews.author: E. Bennet

customer_reviews.title: Great start
customer_reviews.text: If you're thinking about trying new tea this is the place to be! This tea was packaged nicely and came on time and had great flavor and the mix consists of a good selection of morning, afternoon or night time teas.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: Most flavorful black tea I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: Each one of the different black teas were amazing, so full of flavor. They taste so much better than the tea bags you buy at the store. If you are a tea drinker, you need to experience this loose leaf tea, it sets the bar very high on all black teas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent amount and yummy!
customer_reviews.text: I will be purchasing again. This is excellent tea that I was able to get several large cups of tea from each little packet. The aroma and taste are fantastic. So glad I purchased this! I plan to buy some as gifts over time, they come in a great box too!
customer_reviews.author: ASHLEY

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Just received my box of tea.....it smells great when it's not used or open yet. But the taste of the tea wasn't fruity at all like the smell. It also smells totally different once used. I even had several friends smell it and give me their opinion and they said the same thing too. There's no hint of natural sweetness like I thought there would have been. The loose leafs are also so much more smaller than what's pictured because it spills all out of the tea ball and the holes in my tea ball are also very small. Not up-to-par with what I was expecting. This tea is too expense and I wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: JYLY

customer_reviews.title: Different flavors
customer_reviews.text: The flavors are just...different. I mean, they sound good, but the first sip is kind of weird on some of the flavors but they are blended lovely and taste smooth. After the first sip, the tea goes down just fine. :) The only problem I came up with the loose tea is that some of it is so fine it goes through my steepers. I don't mind having loose tea in my water, but that has happened on three of the flavors I've tried so far.
customer_reviews.author: Hope Forster

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. Got the sample kit (with mug) for Christmas ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Got the sample kit (with mug) for Christmas and will buy more of the flavors I like (mostly the black, green and some herbals). Just a word of caution, though, especially for the white teas, when the label states "Ginger", that's exactly what it means. Also, the Earl Grey was especially strong and I didn't care for it or the red colored mug... but overall love the set as a complete package.
customer_reviews.author: Sigma

customer_reviews.title: The packaging & presentation is very nice. Makes for good gift for a tea-lover
customer_reviews.text: The packaging & presentation is very nice. Makes for good gift for a tea-lover. The flavors are nice. The lavender tastes a bit perfume-y but its not bad. The orange blossom & chamomilles are more my taste. I would reorder other teas from this company. The amount of tea in one envelope is sufficient for one steep.
customer_reviews.author: Ilesina

customer_reviews.title: Love the individual packaging
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with this tea and the packaging. What a great idea to individually package just the right amount of tea per cup! I would only ask that the package states the tea contains caffeine or is caffeine free. I am probably going to buy another set for holiday gift baskets.
customer_reviews.author: Dino

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful presentation but unfortunately not tasty at all.
customer_reviews.text: I love herbal tea and drink at least few cups a day. My list of favorites includes Teavana loose teas, Mighty Leaf, Numi. I like some of Tazo's teas. Forte tea is beautifully packed, I can see dry fruits and leaves in the pouch. I would expect it to be tasty, but unfortunately I simply didn't this tea at all. I tried all types and all of them aren't tasty. Sorry....
customer_reviews.author: Leonid

customer_reviews.title: Best Tea
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tea. My daughter buys it for me on most occasions. I bought this assortment for my friend's birthday. Had to wrap it up quickly before I sampled some. Flavors are all superb. Haven't picked a favorite in over 10 years of using it.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa L. Foust

customer_reviews.title: Delicious variety
customer_reviews.text: Delicious variety! I find each packet has the perfect amount for single servings but you can, if course, add more water if you want a milder flavor If you enjoy flavorful, loose tea, I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa C.

customer_reviews.title: Lacking a little in presentation
customer_reviews.text: For some reason, I was slightly disappointed with this set. I feel like the printing on the box made it feel a little "cheap." I think it's a good variety of flavours for a sampler, but as a gift box I think I could do better.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Tea for Teachers!
customer_reviews.text: We added this wonderful tea variety pack to a gift bag we put together for 4 teachers of a second grade class at an elementary school in Washington, DC. They were delighted!
customer_reviews.author: MR&MRSJones

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality of both of these products.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this tea as a gift. I have received excellent compliments about the good flavor of a couple of the tea samples. Being a tea drinker myself, I would definitely recommend this product. I also gave the Tea Forte’ tea infuser cup and have heard positive things about it, also.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy K Grove

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as part of an auction basket I was donating and it is perfect. I love the box in which it comes and it's a great addition. I can't speak to the tea itself, but I'm impressed with packaging and price.
customer_reviews.author: Kim C

customer_reviews.title: Great sampler pack
customer_reviews.text: I love this company’s quality of product. Fresh teas with lots of flavor. I wanted to try a few instead of guessing what might be to my liking before buying a full size tin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift Idea
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sampler with a steeping cup for a gift. She was very happy with it. The sampler comes beautifully packaged and with a good variety to try. I can’t say anything about the taste as I didn’t drink them. I think any tea enthusiast would enjoy this.
customer_reviews.author: velvetrider

customer_reviews.title: Love they are serving size
customer_reviews.text: I like that they are serving size because they stay fresher and they also are easy for the grandchildren to use. I think they like making it better than drinking it but it is amazing flavored too.
customer_reviews.author: S. J. Sines

customer_reviews.title: What’s not to love?!
customer_reviews.text: As someone who loves steeped tea but didn’t care for measuring the tea itself, this set is the answer to my prayers! Pre measured packets in a delightful presentation AND wonderfully flavored...I have found everything here. Great gift idea as well...
customer_reviews.author: Connie S Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Great starter sampler for a new tea drinker!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first experience with single serves. This pack came with various mixed varieties so that I can sample to help me decide which types of tea I’d like more. I’m leaning more toward the Chai. The aromas are all so nice! I just wanted to fill my home with these aromas. The flavors are just as good as they smell, so soothing. I will definitely buy more and explore more flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Didn't care for them, but obviously of decent quality
customer_reviews.text: I guess I'm glad I tried it. And they steep easily. But I ended up not really liking any if them. I drink a lot if tea and lots of different kinds so I'm surprised that none of these were appealing to me.
customer_reviews.author: Conversio

customer_reviews.title: I purchased the assortment with the KATI cup and love how easy it is to brew my tea
customer_reviews.text: These teas are delicious and taste very high quality, but are very affordable. I purchased the assortment with the KATI cup and love how easy it is to brew my tea! The tea is packaged with the perfect amount in each single serving.
customer_reviews.author: Cara Pletzer

customer_reviews.title: A box of aroma that will give you the happy sigh!
customer_reviews.text: I think I found a favorite out of all of them, but to be sure, I may have to reorder two or three more boxes. You know, just for research. 😉
customer_reviews.author: Lena

product_meta.title: Tea Forte Single Steeps Loose Leaf Tea Sampler, Assorted Variety Tea Box, 15 Single Serve Pouches (Sampler - Lotus)
feature_bullets: LOTUS COLLECTION, a curated assortment of five relaxing hot teas for mind, body & spirit - a unique and unprecedented gourmet collection of highest-grade, small-lot, certified organic teas: Vanilla Pear, Orange Jasmine, Mountain Oolong, Darjeeling Quince, Lemon Lavender
DIVERSE, SUBTLE FLAVORS from only the finest tea leaves in the world, blended with aromatic fruits, spices and herbs
DELIGHTFUL TEA GIFT SET with a premium collection of gourmet teas, a most welcomed hostess gift or gift for tea lovers
LOOSE LEAF TEA SAMPLER with 15 assorted, pre-portioned single serving pouches per gift box; each pouch contains the perfect measure for a perfect 12oz cup or pot of tea
PREPARE THE PERFECT CUP of hot tea anywhere, simply empty the contents into a teapot or infusing basket and pour hot water over tea leaves, steep and enjoy

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
